readable.title: 1277743944_f4e8c78403
readable.content: A boy dressed in khaki shorts and a red shirt runs on a beach with green , white and blue structures and a half moon behind him . A boy in a red sweater running on the beach A boy wearing a red shirt runs along a beach . A boy wearing a red sweater runs along a colorful beach . Young boy in red runs on beach and passes white , blue and green beach huts .
